languages.text: {n}Какое-то время сервитор безмолвствует. Затем произносит почти растерянно:{/n} "Неужели мы настолько плохо понимаем? Несовершенство терзает".
{n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."
languages.original_text: {n}Какое-то время сервитор безмолвствует. Затем произносит почти растерянно:{/n} "Неужели мы настолько плохо понимаем? Несовершенство терзает".

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains."
{n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains."
{n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains."
{n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains."
{n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."
{n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."

languages.text: {n}Le servitor reste silencieux quelques instants, puis ajoute, presque désemparé :{/n} « Est-il vrai que nous comprenons si mal les choses ? L'imperfection est pour nous une douleur... »
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor reste silencieux quelques instants, puis ajoute, presque désemparé :{/n} « Est-il vrai que nous comprenons si mal les choses ? L'imperfection est une douleur... »

languages.text: {n}机仆沉默片刻，然后它几乎无可奈何地说。{/n}“我们的理解真的这么糟糕吗？不完美令我们感到痛苦。”
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工沉默片刻，然后它几乎无可奈何地说。{/n}“我们的理解真的这么糟糕吗？不完美令人感到痛苦。”

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor schweigt eine Weile. Dann sagt er fast hilflos:{/n} "Ist es wahr, dass wir so wenig verstehen? Unvollkommenheit schmerzt uns."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor schweigt eine Weile. Dann sagt er fast hilflos:{/n} "Ist es wahr, dass wir so wenig verstehen? Unvollkommenheit schmerzt."

languages.text: {n}El servidor permanece en silencio durante un rato. Luego, casi desesperado, dice:{/n} «¿Es cierto que nuestro nivel de comprensión es tan bajo? La imperfección duele».
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor permanece en silencio durante un rato. Luego, casi desesperado, dice:{/n} «¿Es cierto que nuestro nivel de comprensión es tan bajo? La imperfección duele».

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターは、しばらく黙り込んだ。そして弱々しく答えた。{/n}「私たちは、それほどまでに理解できていないのか？不完全であることに苦痛を感じる」
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターは、しばらく黙り込んだ。そして弱々しく答えた。{/n}「私たちは、それほどまでに理解できていないのか？不完全であることに苦痛を感じる」

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör, bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Sonra neredeyse çaresizce devam ediyor.{/n} "Anlayışımız bu kadar kötü mü? Kusurluluk bize acı veriyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor is silent for a while. Then it says almost helplessly,{/n} "Is it true that we understand so poorly? Imperfection pains us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Servitör, bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Sonra neredeyse çaresizce devam ediyor.{/n} "Anlayışımız bu kadar kötü mü? Kusurluluk bize acı veriyor."
